kt4j

Class Bytes

  • java.lang.Object
    • kt4j.Bytes

  • public class Bytes
extends Object
    A utility class that provides various common operations related with bytes.
    Author:
    kumai

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Bytes.ByteArrayWrapper
      A implementation that wraps byte array.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static byte[] base64Decode(byte[] encodedBytes)
      Decodes the specified bytes from Base64 notation.

      Encodes the specified bytes to Base64 notation.
      static byte[] bytesWithInt(int value)
      Gets 32-bit big-endian bytes for the specified integer value.
      static byte[] bytesWithLong(long value)
      Gets 64-bit big-endian bytes for the specified long integer value.
      static String utf8(byte[] data)
      Returns a string for the specified bytes encoded by UTF-8.
      static byte[] utf8(String str)
      Returns a byte array encoded by UTF-8 for the specified string.
